keyMoments.title: Confronts Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Hachi confronts Hody Jones at Fish-Man District, warning him to stop his plans and not use Energy Steroids, demonstrating his complete redemption from his Arlong Park days.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hachi's transformation from villain to hero, willing to stand against the ideology he once supported.
keyMoments.quote: You should all stop this insanity! The Energy Steroids will only destroy your bodies!

keyMoments.title: Wounded by Vander Decken's Arrows
keyMoments.description: Hachi is severely wounded when Vander Decken IX uses his Mato Mato powers to mark him and attack with pursuing arrows.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ruthlessness of the villains and leaves Hachi critically injured, raising the stakes of the conflict.

keyMoments.title: Warns of Palace Attack
keyMoments.description: Despite his critical wounds, Hachi manages to warn Sanji and Chopper about the imminent palace attack before passing out.
keyMoments.significance: Hachi's sacrifice completes his redemption arc, showing he's willing to risk his life to protect others.

reveals.information: Hachi has completely rejected the fish-man supremacist ideology and now fights against it

relationships.description: Hachi opposes Hody's plans and ideology, leading to violent confrontation.

evolutionMoments.description: Hachi confronts Hody at Fish-Man District and is attacked for his opposition.

keyMoments.title: Leaves Hard-Shell Tower
keyMoments.description: For the first time in ten years, Shirahoshi leaves her tower prison with Luffy's help, traveling inside Megalo.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Shirahoshi's first act of freedom and courage, choosing adventure over safety.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Desire to Visit Mother's Grave
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi explains that she has wanted to visit the Sea Forest for ten years to see her mother's grave.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional weight behind her request and her deep love for her deceased mother.
keyMoments.quote: It's a graveyard. It's the place I've most wanted to go for ten years.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Mother's Grave
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi finally arrives at Queen Otohime's grave in the Sea Forest, the first time she's been able to visit in ten years.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax of Shirahoshi's storyline in this episode - achieving her decade-long dream.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi has been unable to visit her mother's grave for ten years due to her imprisonment
Shirahoshi could not attend her own mother's funeral due to Vander Decken's threat

relationships.description: Luffy helps Shirahoshi achieve her dream of visiting her mother's grave.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy escorts Shirahoshi to the Sea Forest, helping her leave her tower for the first time in ten years.

relationships.description: Shirahoshi's deceased mother, whom she deeply loved and wanted to visit.

evolutionMoments.description: Shirahoshi's longing to visit her mother's grave is revealed.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Reveals Superior Planning
keyMoments.description: Hody explains that he learned from Arlong's mistakes and planned more carefully, positioning himself as a more intelligent and calculated villain.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hody as a formidable antagonist who has studied and improved upon his predecessor's methods.
keyMoments.quote: There is no stopping our objective. We need Fish-Man Island to destroy the human race and carry out Arlong's will.

keyMoments.title: Palace Gates Opened
keyMoments.description: Hody's plan succeeds as the palace gates are opened, allowing his forces to enter Ryugu Palace.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of Hody's conspiracy - the palace is breached and the assault can begin.

reveals.information: Hody has learned from Arlong's mistakes and created a more sophisticated plan to carry out fish-man supremacist goals
Hody has allied with Vander Decken IX and hired Hyouzou as a mercenary

relationships.description: Hody and Decken have formed an alliance of convenience for their assault on the palace.

evolutionMoments.description: Hody clarifies that Decken is his ally, not his subordinate.

relationships.description: Hody views Hachi as a traitor to fish-man supremacy and orders his attack.

evolutionMoments.description: Hody dismisses Hachi's warnings and orders Decken to attack him.

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Mato Mato Power
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken demonstrates his Mato Mato no Mi power by marking Hachi and attacking him with a lock-on knife and pursuing arrows.
keyMoments.significance: First clear combat demonstration of the Mato Mato no Mi's devastating targeting ability.

abilities.description: Decken can mark a target by touching them with his hand, causing any projectile thrown by that hand to lock onto and chase the target relentlessly.

reveals.information: The Mato Mato no Mi allows Decken to mark targets and have projectiles pursue them relentlessly

relationships.description: Decken is allied with Hody Jones but maintains his independence.

evolutionMoments.description: Decken emphasizes he is Hody's ally, not his subordinate.

keyMoments.title: At Queen Otohime's Grave
keyMoments.description: Jinbe is revealed sitting at Queen Otohime's grave, reflecting on her legacy and ideals that live on after her death.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Jinbe as a keeper of Fish-Man Island's history and Queen Otohime's ideals.
keyMoments.quote: Even after her death, no one has forgotten her ideals.

keyMoments.title: Explains Shirahoshi's Confinement
keyMoments.description: Jinbe explains to Luffy the tragic circumstances of Shirahoshi's imprisonment - she couldn't even attend her mother's funeral due to Vander Decken's threat.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory that deepens the emotional weight of the scene and explains Shirahoshi's decade-long imprisonment.
keyMoments.quote: She could not even go to her mother's funeral, and she had to stay in the tower.

reveals.information: Jinbe knows the full history of Shirahoshi's imprisonment and Queen Otohime's assassination

relationships.description: Jinbe deeply respected Queen Otohime and her ideals for peace between humans and fish-men.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe is shown paying respects at Otohime's grave, demonstrating his reverence for her legacy.

relationships.description: Jinbe encounters Luffy at the Sea Forest and begins to explain Fish-Man Island's history.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe meets Luffy again at Queen Otohime's grave.

keyMoments.title: Discovered in Sea Forest
keyMoments.description: Franky discovers Den, Tom's brother, in the Sea Forest. Den is working in the graveyard of sunken ships, though he is not fully visible.
keyMoments.significance: Connects to Franky's backstory with Tom and establishes Den's presence in the Sea Forest.

reveals.information: Den is Tom's brother, connecting him to Franky's backstory
Den works in the Sea Forest among the graveyard of sunken ships

evolutionMoments.description: Den is identified as Tom's brother when Franky encounters him.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Mercenary Motivation
keyMoments.description: Hyouzou clarifies that he's only working with Hody Jones for the money, not out of ideological commitment.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hyouzou as a mercenary rather than a true believer in fish-man supremacy.
keyMoments.quote: I'm only in it for the money.

reveals.information: Hyouzou is a mercenary motivated by money rather than ideology

relationships.description: Hyouzou is hired by Hody Jones as a mercenary.

evolutionMoments.description: Hyouzou clarifies he's only working for Hody for the money.
